skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the first ship of the Shiratsuyu-class, but I was meant to be part of the Hatsuharu-class... Anyway, where am I? Why am I introducing myself...? I don't really know... But I hope I can be of service.
skins.acquisition: Um, I'm Shiratsuyu, the first ship of the Shiratsuyu-class... Hello, Commander. My name is Shiratsuyu... Huh? I just said that? Hm... I don't know how to get back home, so I guess I'll stay here. I hope I can be of service.
skins.login: Huh? So this is where you were, Commander... *Giggles*
skins.details: Commander, what are you looking at? Hm? Come on, tell me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, did you see my torpedo? ... It went off somewhere suddenly.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Weird... lately I seem to forget what I'm forgetting... What am I gonna do...
skins.secretaryIdle3: *Yawn*... So tired... I hope the commander isn't looking... so I'll sleep for a bit longer...
skins.secretaryTouch: *Yawn*... I get so tired when people touch me...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whua... it feels weird when you touch me like that...

skins.JPClientName: ご注文はギョライですか？
skins.shipDescription: H-here they come... Your order, and your cutesy dutesy maid... Whoaahh! I'm sorry! Look out!
skins.acquisition: H-here they come... Your order, and your cutesy dutesy maid... Whoaahh! I'm sorry! Look out!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, have you seen my torpedo...? Standing on it...? Wait... Oh noooo!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Are you hungry, Commander? Umm, I have a sandwich... strawberry cake, and some coffee, if you want...
skins.secretaryTouch: Whooahhh! ... Gosh, that was too close... Thanks, Commander...
